unnormalised: ## Level Up Your Insta Game: Brand Collabs 101!
normalised: ## Level Up Your Insta Game: Brand Collabs one hundred and one!

unnormalised: Hey everyone! Ever wondered how your fave Instagrammers manage to snag those sweet brand collaborations? It's not just about having killer selfies (though, let's be real, that helps!). It's about building a brand and making yourself collab-worthy!
normalised: Hey everyone! Ever wondered how your fave Instagrammers manage to snag those sweet brand collaborations? It's not just about having killer selfies (though, let's be real, that helps!). It's about building a brand and making yourself collab-worthy!

unnormalised: Think about it: brands like Manyavar want to reach a specific audience. If you’re known for your bomb saree pics and talk about sustainable fashion near places like Janpath, Delhi, they'll notice you! It’s all about finding your niche. Are you the go-to for budget travel tips around Rajasthan, or maybe a fitness guru sharing home workout routines? Whatever it is, OWN IT!
normalised: Think about it: brands like Manyavar want to reach a specific audience. If you’re known for your bomb saree pics and talk about sustainable fashion near places like Janpath, Delhi, they'll notice you! It’s all about finding your niche. Are you the go-to for budget travel tips around Rajasthan, or maybe a fitness guru sharing home workout routines? Whatever it is, OWN IT!

unnormalised: So, how do you actually get those collabs rolling? Firstly, engagement is key. Reply to comments, like photos, participate in relevant hashtags like #IndianFashion or #DelhiFoodie. Make your profile POP! Think of it as your online portfolio – make sure your pics are high-quality and showcase your personality.
normalised: So, how do you actually get those collabs rolling? Firstly, engagement is key. Reply to comments, like photos, participate in relevant hashtags like hash Indian Fashion or hash Delhi Foodie. Make your profile POP! Think of it as your online portfolio – make sure your pics are high-quality and showcase your personality.

unnormalised: Next, start reaching out! Don't be shy. Identify brands that align with your values and aesthetic. A simple DM or email expressing your interest can go a long way. Maybe even create a killer pitch deck showing how you can help them reach their audience. Remember that Diwali campaign proposal you drafted on 20/10/2023? Dust it off and adapt it!
normalised: Next, start reaching out! Don't be shy. Identify brands that align with your values and aesthetic. A simple D M or email expressing your interest can go a long way. Maybe even create a killer pitch deck showing how you can help them reach their audience. Remember that Diwali campaign proposal you drafted on twentieth October two thousand and twenty three? Dust it off and adapt it!

unnormalised: Pro-tip: Don't just focus on big national brands. Local businesses like that amazing chaat place near your home in Bandra might be looking for influencers too! Think smaller too, like bookstores that need promotion for book launches happening at 14:00 hrs.
normalised: Pro-tip: Don't just focus on big national brands. Local businesses like that amazing chaat place near your home in Bandra might be looking for influencers too! Think smaller too, like bookstores that need promotion for book launches happening at two post meridiem.

unnormalised: Finally, be professional. Meet deadlines, deliver quality content, and be transparent about your sponsored posts (use those hashtags like #ad or #sponsored!). Build trust with your audience, because at the end of the day, they're the ones clicking those links and buying those products. Remember that influencer meet you were supposed to attend on 26/01/2024? Networking is also super important. Good luck snagging those dream brand deals! Maybe you'll even score a trip to Goa, all expenses paid! Imagine, sipping coconut water on the beach thanks to your awesome Instagram game! You'll be counting your earnings in Rs.! Just remember the 30% tax, haha! Happy influencing!
normalised: Finally, be professional. Meet deadlines, deliver quality content, and be transparent about your sponsored posts (use those hashtags like hash ad or hash sponsored!). Build trust with your audience, because at the end of the day, they're the ones clicking those links and buying those products. Just remember the thirty percent tax, haha! Happy influencing!
